name: Zyclara

indications.text: zyclara 2.5 % 3.75 % indicated topical treatment clinically typical , visible , palpable actinic keratoses ( ak ) face balding scalp immunocompetent adults . ( 1.1 ) zyclara , 3.75 % indicated topical treatment external genital perianal warts ( egw ) immunocompetent patients 12 years age older . ( 1.2 )

contraindications.text: topical ; oral , ophthalmic , intra-anal intravaginal . ( 2.1 ) ak : apply thin layer daily bedtime affected area ( either entire face balding scalp ) two 2-week treatment cycles separated 2-week no-treatment period . apply 0.5 grams application . ( 2.2 ) egw : apply thin layer daily bedtime total clearance 8 weeks . apply 0.25 grams application . ( 2.3 )

warningsAndPrecautions: supplied zyclara ( imiquimod ) cream white faintly yellow color . zyclara , 2.5 % 3.75 % supplied white plastic 30 ml pump bottles , equipped white cap . 7.5 g pump bottle delivers fewer 28 full actuations : 2.5 % cream , ndc 99207-276-75 3.75 % cream , ndc 99207-271-75 zyclara , 3.75 % also supplied unit-dose plastic laminate packets contain 0.25 g cream : 3.75 % cream , box 28 packets , ndc 99207-270-28
indications_original: ZYCLARA 2.5% and 3.75% is indicated for the topical treatment of clinically typical, visible, or palpable actinic keratoses (AK) of the face or balding scalp in immunocompetent adults. ( 1.1 ) ZYCLARA, 3.75% is indicated for the topical treatment of external genital and perianal warts (EGW) in immunocompetent patients 12 years of age or older. ( 1.2 )
contraindications_original: For topical use only; not for oral, ophthalmic, intra-anal or intravaginal use. ( 2.1 ) AK : Apply a thin layer once daily at bedtime to affected area (either entire face or balding scalp) for two 2-week treatment cycles separated by a 2-week no-treatment period. Apply up to 0.5 grams at each application. ( 2.2 ) EGW : Apply a thin layer once daily at bedtime until total clearance or up to 8 weeks. Apply up to 0.25 grams at each application. ( 2.3 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
How Supplied
                  
                  ZYCLARA (imiquimod) cream is white to faintly yellow in color.
                  ZYCLARA, 2.5% and 3.75% is supplied as white plastic 30 mL pump bottles, equipped with a white cap. The 7.5 g pump bottle delivers no fewer than 28 full actuations:
                  
                     2.5% cream, NDC 99207-276-75
                     3.75% cream, NDC 99207-271-75
                  
                  ZYCLARA, 3.75% is also supplied in unit-dose plastic laminate packets which contain 0.25 g of cream:
                  
                     3.75% cream, box of 28 packets, NDC 99207-270-28
